00016 char *Trims(char *srcVal){
00017         char *cp1 = srcVal, *cp2 = srcVal;
00018 
00019         if(srcVal){
00020                 while(*cp1 == ' ')
00021                         cp1++;
00022 
00023                 while(*cp1)
00024                         *cp2++ = *cp1++;
00025 
00026                 if(cp2 != srcVal){
00027                         while(*--cp2 == ' ');
00028                         *(cp2+1) = 0;
00029                 }else
00030                    *srcVal = 0;
00031         }
00032         return srcVal;
00033 }
00034 
00035 void conf_init(char *path){
00036         FILE *fp;
00037     char *p, *right_val, *left_val;
00038         char buf[100], bufs[100];
00039         fp = fopen(path, "r");
00040         assert((fp!=NULL));
00041         while(!feof(fp)){
00042                 fgets(buf,2, fp);
00043                 if(!strcmp(buf, "#")){
00044                         fgets(buf, 100, fp);
00045                 }else if(!strcmp(buf, "[")){
00046                         fgets(buf, 100, fp);
00047                 }else{
00048                         fgets(bufs, 100, fp);
00049         
00050                         if(bufs[strlen(bufs)-1] == '\n')
00051                                 bufs[strlen(bufs)-1] = ' ';
00052 
00053                         p = strcat(buf, bufs);
00054                         left_val = strtok(p, "=");
00055                         right_val = strtok(NULL, "=");
00056 
00057                         left_val = Trims(left_val);
00058                         right_val = Trims(right_val);
00059 
00060                         if(left_val == NULL)continue;
00061 
00062                         if(right_val == NULL) setenv(left_val,"",1);                    
00063                         else setenv(left_val, right_val, 1);
00064 
00065                 }
00066         }
00067         fclose(fp);
00068 }
00069 
00070 char *conf_get(char *val){
00071         char *p;
00072         if((p = getenv(val)) == NULL){
00073                 printf("can't get val conf: %s\n", val);
00074         }
00075         return p;
00076 }
